outputs.output_descr: The project is designed to address the socio-economic conditions of the poor and vulnerable in the target communities with a specific focus on capacity enhancement and empowerment towards labour mobility and the creation of self-employment among beneficiaries. The project seeks to integrate approaches to short term employment generation, environmental management and disaster revovery.

project_descr: The project is designed to address the socio-economic conditions of the poor and vulnerable in the target communities for sustainable livelihoods.
project_title: Pov Reduc & Emp'ment Programme for Sust'able Livelihoods
